responses: This is a detailed response with multiple sentences that discusses various aspects of the product and service experience
The customer service team was incredibly helpful and provided excellent support throughout the entire process

extreme_lengths.very_long: This is an extremely long response that contains many words and goes on for quite a while discussing multiple aspects of the service and product quality in great detail with numerous examples and explanations that would be typical of a very engaged and detail-oriented customer providing comprehensive feedback about their experience with the company and its offerings and services...

rating_analysis.description: Sample ratings for testing rating distribution and average calculations

usage_guide.for_sentiment_analysis_tests: Use sentiment_analysis_scenarios or the text_responses arrays
usage_guide.for_length_stats_tests: Use length_stats_scenarios for expected value validation
usage_guide.for_multiple_choice_tests: Use single_select and multiple_select from choice_responses
usage_guide.for_edge_case_testing: Use the edge_cases section for robustness testing
